author: TarasB B.
comment: It works, thanks a lot!! Moto 360 2015 (42mm), 6.0.1. upd. Please-please, add a long vibro (or pattern) for "fully Charged" notification. My phone in most cases set to DnD mode in that hours I have my Moto on charger. So, I need a notification on my watches, NOT on my phone.  I really do not want to leave my watches on charger longer that it needs for charging.

reply.author: ESTAM Apps
reply.content: I've published a new version with a *experimental* option of vibrating when reaching 100% battery charge. Let me know if that works for you.

author: Dan Flynn
comment: Thank you so much for this app, I was pissed off when Motorola disabled the Cinema mode black screen when charging with the Marshmallow update. I opened this app once and now every time it reliably opens and turns my screen black when in the dock. Exactly what I wanted! 👌

reply.author: ESTAM Apps
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! Glad it helped!

title: Perfect! (Moto 360 2015 46mm 6.0.1)

author: Andrew Haynes
comment: The popular app with similar functionality, Slumber, stopped working after the marshmallow update. This app brings back the black screen while charging, and works flawlessly.

reply.author: ESTAM Apps
reply.content: The issue was that Moto did some changes with Marhsmallow in their app that was displayed when charging, so I needed to work around that to make it work. Glad it helped you.
